"BMI: weight (kg)/height (m) squared.
You can't judge if you're \"obese\" just by BMI value. People can have more fat than muscle with normal BMI and still classify as obese."
"Ba'a iya nazrin yanayin lafiyarka ba saboda adadin kisen jiki yana na dadai. BMI na nan kawai ma mahallinsa ne."
"Ba'a iya nazari ba tare da bayanan kisen jiki ba. BMI na nan kawai ma mahallinsa ne."

Da alamar BMI bai sauri so sai. Zai iya zama mummunan sakamako ma tsarin rigafin jiki da kuma dukan kiwon lafiya. Ka kula so sai nauyinka da abincin ka, kuma ka tabbata kana da aikin daidaita su yau da kullum.
Looks like your BMI is low. Pay close attention to your weight and nutrition, make sure you have a balanced workout routine.
BMI din ka ya wuce iyakar (%s), haka adadin kise na jiki. Ka na bukatar lka kara motsa jiki.

"\"Basal metabolism\" refers to the lowest energy required to maintain basic life activities. Basal metabolic rate is decided by how much energy consumed by muscle mass. People with higher basal metabolic rate don't gain weight easily.
You can keep fit and balanced intake of meat, fish, soy products and dairy products to increase muscle mass."

%d ainihin kalori na jikin ka, mutanen da yi ke adadin muhimmin rayuwa na kasa na iya kara jiki kuma zasu ji gajiya, yi kokari ka tafiya ma dan lokaci bayan ka gama cin abinci kuma ka yi gudu sau ɗaya a mako.
Adadin kisen jikin ka ya yi kasa. Kise wani sashi ne mai muhimmanci a cikin ganggan jiki da kuma ainhin ƙwaƙwalwa, raguwa kise mai yawa na iya jawo cuta na endrocrine.
Kisen jikin ka yayi yawa, yi hakuri kula da cin abinci kuma kai ta yawan motsa jiki don ka saura da lafiya.
Ya kamata adadin yanayin jiki ya kasance %1$s~%2$s, ka na bukatar ka rage %3$s na kisen jiki.
Ya kamata yanayin adadin jiki ya kasance %1$s~%2$s. Adadin kisen jiki na yanzu yayi yawa, ka na bukata ka rage cin abinci, gyara rayuwan ciye ciyen ka, da kuma kara yawan motsa jiki.
"Za'a a share nauyin bayanai masu dacewa bayan an share rajistan bayanai, a ci gaba?"
"Ba'a iya bincike ma mutane masu tsawo fiye da cm 220"
"Ba'a iya bincike ma mutane sama da shekaru 99"
"Ba'a iya lissafa Bmi ma guntayen mutane dake kasa da cm 90"
"Ba'a iya bincike ma mutane kasa da shekaru 6"

"\"Body fat\" refers to the proportion of fat in total body weight. In addition to obesity, high body fat ratio can also increase the prevalence of many obesity diseases; while low body fat ratio may cause endocrine disorders.
Strong muscles plus balanced body fat ratio will make you a good looking and fit body figure."

"\"Bone mass\" refers to the amount of calcium, phosphorus, and other matters contained in the bone. Women with less bone mass caused by weight loss or amenorrhoea should pay more attention especially.
Try to keep balanced intake of calcium, and take 15-minute sunbathing and 20-minute exercise every day."
Adadin lafiyan kashin ka na kasa. Ka yi ta yawan cin abinci mai kaltsium, yawan wanka cikin rana da kuma motsa jiki kowane rana ma mintuna 15-20.

"\"Muscle mass\" refers to the mass of skeletal and smooth muscles and other muscle tissues contained water.
Loss of muscle mass will result in a lower basal metabolism and reduce energy consumption, and you'll gain weight or fall ill more easily. Getting more muscles is helpful to improve basal metabolism so as to reduce body fat."

Ya kamata adadin tsokan ka ya kasance %1$s~%2$s. Ka na kuma buƙatar karin tsoka zuwa %3$s. Ƙara yawan aiki na ƙarfin da motsa jiki don ka daidaita yawan tsoka. Tabbatar da adadin kalorin da ga dauka kafin da kuma bayan motsa jiki.

Ya kamata adadin tsokan ka ya kasance %1$s~%2$s. Ka na kuma buƙatar karin tsoka zuwa. Ƙara yawan aiki na ƙarfin da motsa jiki don ka daidaita yawan tsoka. Tabbatar da adadin kalorin da ga dauka kafin da kuma bayan motsa jiki.
Adadin tsokan ka yayi kasa kwarai. Ka kula da cin abincin ka da kuma yawan motsa jiki saboda ka samun tsoka. Yawan adadi na tsoka zai taimake ka gina lafiyayyen rayuwa.

Flight ratio is the share of the time you spend in the air without touching the ground as opposed to the overall step time. Step time is the combination of flight time and ground contact time. Flight ratio is an important criterion for measuring running efficiency.
Only smart shoes can analyze flight ratio
Who can try landing on their forefeet when running
Stick to your own running habits
"We don't recommend changing your running habits. If you choose to land on your midfeet and heels, wear shoes with better cushioning to reduce the impact of landing."
When your knees require more protection, you can try landing on your forefeet more.
Strike the ground right below you, keep your knees slightly bent, lean your body forward.
Run as if you were rotating a hot wheel with your feet.
Make smaller steps when you increase running speed.
Connect running shoes and make sure you land on your forefeet
"Turn on Bluetooth and connect shoes before running. Keep Bluetooth on when running."
Striking the ground with your forefeet requires stronger calf muscles and Achilles tendons; landing on your midfeet or heels strongly affects your knees.
Only smart shoes can analyze your landing technique

"When your knees require more protection, you can try landing on your forefeet more.
1) Strike the ground right below you, keep your knees slightly bent, lean your body forward."
2) Run as if you were rotating a hot wheel with your feet.
3) Make smaller steps when you increase running speed.

"Fasten the band as tightly as you feel comfortable. Wearing too tight or too loose will affect the heart rate results.
Wear the band slightly above the thinnest part of your wrist."
Mi Band Pulse and Mi Band 2 are equipped with a heart rate sensor
Your exercise heart rate zone is calculated as below. Select the appropriate heart rate zone can significantly increase the exercise efficiency.
Step frequency is the number of steps you make per minute when running.
Runners usually increase their stride to gain speed. However, using this method can result in muscle damage. You can try to increase your step frequency to gain speed.
Long-distance runners usually make 180 steps per minute. We recommend using this value as your step frequency goal.
Connect band to make sure your step frequency is detected.
"Turn on Bluetooth and connect band before running. Keep Bluetooth on when running."
"Pace is one of the speed definitions generally used in a marathon. It's the time required for you to run 1 km."
Keeping consistent speed throughout the run is key. A steady pace curve means you did well.
Pace can be measured easier. During a marathon, you can adjust your pace according to the split time of a certain distance.
Why not use speed per hour?

When running slowly, most people would naturally land on their midfeet or heels. When the running speed increases, more people would strike the ground with their forefeet. For example, most sprinters choose to land on their forefeet when running.
Landing on your midfeet or heels strongly affects your knees. Striking the ground with your forefeet requires stronger calf muscles and Achilles tendons.
"Pace is one of the speed definitions generally used in a marathon. It's the time required for you to run 1 km."

"Tempo run needs a good control and plan of your physical strength. Strength distribution is the key to a long-distance running, and it depends on the pace you planned to have. With different speeds used, tempo run can divide into easy run, long run and lactate-threshold run, etc. A consistent and continuous speed is needed and beneficial to exert your strength fully in a marathon."
Stride means the distance covered by a step when walking or running.
Find the fittest stride of your own
"Land on your forefeet. Make sure the landing point is close to your body's gravity center. Press your feet firmly against the ground with every stride."
Long-distance runners usually make 180 steps per minute. We recommend using this value as your step frequency goal.
Step frequency is the number of steps you make per minute when running.
Runners usually increase their stride to gain speed. However, using this method can result in muscle damage. You can try to increase your step frequency to gain speed.

For most amateur runners, slow step frequency and big stride will make the landing point of the feet fall in front of the center of gravity. Like braking, it will force you move backwards, thus bring poor energy efficiency and higher risks of injury.

"You are more likely to get injured when your feet stay in contact with the ground longer, as your body weight is applied to one of your feet for a more extended period of time.
Shorter contact time might lower the risk of injuries."
\"Ground contact time\" is the time your feet stay in contact with the ground. It decreases as you go faster.
Only smart shoes can analyze your ground contact time

"Keep your GCT between 160-200 ms.
Here's how you can keep it shorter: don't land on your heels, shorten your stride, and strengthen your Achilles tendons. Consult a physician to get exercise recommendations for your Achilles tendons. Keep working on your running technique."

Na fahimci hadarin yin amfani da siga na beta

"Mi Fit beta wani siga na gwadawa wanda ake bada wa ma Mabiyan Mi saboda su ksance sune farkon wandanda zasu gwada sababbin ayyukan abubuwa.
Idan aka gwada da siga na daidai, siga na beta zai sabunta koda yaushe saboda kar a samu wasu hadari a lokacin da ake amfani dashi, kamar kasa aiki na manhaja, rasa bayanai da sauran su. Ka kula da wannan kafin ka fara amfani dashi."
"Ba'a iya a fita. Sake gwada wa"
Gwadawa na sigan beta na iya sakamakon hadari na manhaja da kuma rasa bayanai, a ci gaba duk da haka?
Bayan ka fita daga sigan beta, cire manhajar daga wayar ka, sai ka cikin App Store don ka sake kafa manhajar Mi Fit dan fara amfani da siga na asali.

"\"Visceral fat\" refers to fat accumulated in the gap of internal organs. High visceral fat level will increase the risk of heart disease, hypertension, hyperlipidemia and other chronic disease.
Visceral fat accumulates easily, but it's very hard to be reduced. You need to maintain a balanced diet and keep aerobic exercise not less than 20 minutes every day."
